Web : www.wttint.com









Date: {{doc.get_formatted ("posting_date")}}

To
 The Manager,
 {{doc.bank_name}},
 {{doc.branch}}

Dear Sir,
 Kindly make the transfer {{doc.account_no}} to the below mentioned account numbers.

{%- for row in doc.amount_table -%} {%- endfor -%}
BENIFICIARY NAME BANK BANK ACCOUNT IFSC CODE CHARGE AMOUNT
{% if row.benificiary_name%}{{ row.benificiary_name}} {% endif %} {% if row.bank_name%}{{ row.bank_name}} {% endif %} {% if row.account_no%}{{ row.account_no}} {% endif %} {% if row.ifsc_code%}{{ row.ifsc_code}} {% endif %} {% if row.charges%}{{ row.charges}} {% endif %} {% if row.amount %}{{frappe.utils.rounded(row.amount, 0)}}{% endif %}
TOTAL {{doc.get_formatted("total_charges")}} {{doc.get_formatted("grand_total")}}
CHEQUE NO:{{doc.cheque}} NET TOTAL {{doc.get_formatted("net_total")}}

Amount (in words): {{doc.net_total2}}




Yours Sincerely

 {{doc.branch}}

BENIFICIARY NAME BANK BANK ACCOUNT IFSC CODE CHARGE AMOUNT
{% if row.benificiary_name%}{{ row.benificiary_name}} {% endif %} {% if row.bank_name%}{{ row.bank_name}} {% endif %} {% if row.account_no%}{{ row.account_no}} {% endif %} {% if row.ifsc_code%}{{ row.ifsc_code}} {% endif %} {% if row.charges%}0 {% endif %} {% if row.amount %}{{frappe.utils.rounded(row.amount, 0)}}{% endif %}
TOTAL {{doc.get_formatted("ib_total_charges")}} {{doc.get_formatted("ib_grand_total")}}
CHEQUE NO:{{doc.ib_cheque}} NET TOTAL {{doc.get_formatted("ib_net_total")}}

Amount (in words): {{doc.ib_net_total2}}




Yours Sincerely
